strings.SS2_NEMCAPTAIN_DESCRIPTION:
The Nemesis Captain issues orders to control the battlefield and fight safely from behind his Adaptive Microbots.

<color=#CCD3E0>< ! > Keep your cool.
strings.SS2_NEMCAPTAIN_OUTRO_FLAVOR: ..and so he left, lighting up a fresh smoke.
strings.SS2_NEMCAPTAIN_OUTRO_FAILURE: ..and so he returned, retired at last.
strings.SS2_NEMCAPTAIN_LORE: This planet sucks man.. *takes hit from cigar*
strings.SS2_NEMCAPTAIN_PASSIVE_DESCRIPTION: Prolonged exposure to combat builds <style=cIsHealth>stress</style>, lowering <style=cIsHealing>regeneration</style> and <style=cIsUtility>accuracy</style> as it builds. Stress is lowered away from enemies.
strings.SS2_NEMCAPTAIN_STRESSPASSIVE_DESC: <style=cIsHealth>Stress</style> lowers <style=cIsHealth>health regeneration</style> and increases <style=cIsDamage>weapon spread</style> and <style=cIsDamage>reload speed</style>. At full <style=cIsHealth>Stress</style>, become <style=cIsHealth>Overstressed</style>.
strings.SS2_NEMCAPTAIN_KEYWORD_STRESS: <style=cKeywordName>Stress</style><style=cSub>Gain Stress by being in combat or receiving damage. Reduce Stress by dealing Critical Strikes, healing, killing enemies, and being out of combat.
strings.SS2_NEMCAPTAIN_KEYWORD_OVERSTRESS: <style=cKeywordName>Overstress</style><style=cSub>Become subjected to the effects of maximum Stress until the Stress meter counts down to 0.
strings.SS2_NEMCAPTAIN_PRIMARY_DESCRIPTION: Rapidly fire for <style=cIsDamage>90% damage</style> per bullet. Can hold up to 20 bullets.
strings.SS2_NEMCAPTAIN_SECONDARY_DESCRIPTION: <style=cIsDamage>Stunning</style>. Arm your cane rifle, then fire a shot for <style=cIsDamage>680% damage</style>.
